name: Empire Group Vietnam
about:
Starting up in many industries, Empire Group is proving the strength at every step and building up top brands in the region and the world.

1992-2006: Build better life values, more modern lifestyle.

1992: Thanh Do Investment Development and Construction Limited Company is established, specializing in investment in real estate, financing, recreational services. Being among the first private company established under the form of the limited company in the reformed period in Vietnam, the company has developed many projects from North to South.

1996: Launch Cay Thong Hotel – Tam Dao Town – Vinh Phuc Province

1998: Be founding shareholder managing and running Ho Tay Water Park

2000: Launch Ho Tay Water Park

2007- 2016: Confirm the company’s name, position by innovative, high-class products, projects.

2011: Change business structure to joint stock company, Thanh Do Investment Development and Construction Joint Stock Company

2012: Launch Ho Tay tourist-cultural- historical electric bus

2015: Launch high-end 5 star Naman Retreat in central Da Nang Province

2016:
• Merge with affiliates, restructure into Empire Group
• Launch construction in Cocobay – central Da Nang Province: top-class tourist & recreation complex in Southeast Asia

educations.description:
Empire Group (formerly known as Thanh Do Investment Development and Construction JSC) is proudly to be one of the first privately held company that was founded in economy innovation period in Vietnam with many outstanding achievements 

With the spirit of dynamic, creativity and tireless striving, Empire Group is always ready to catch the opportunities and face any challenges to develop the Group 

To meet the new demands of investment, business and management as well as operation, management committee of Empire Group made the decision to establish new model – Interdisciplinary privately held company specializing in Entertainment, Hospitality and Real Estate. With its new model, Empire Group will bring international standard products and unique experience.
